scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test:typescript: npm run test:typescript:main && npm run test:typescript:extended
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src/*.ts --ignore src/types.ts --extensions .ts --out-dir lib
scripts.build: rimraf dist lib es && npm run build:types && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
